evidence.claim: Heritage Dialysis utilizes high compliance standards for health information, indicating adherence to HIPAA regulations.
The company mentions the use of secure electronic health records (EHRs) which are required to comply with HIPAA.
References to integration with healthcare clearinghouses for claims processing suggests the use of EDI standards, possibly X12.
The organization focuses on patient data management and sharing, aligning with standards like FHIR, although explicit APIs were not detailed.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transaction utilization or API automation.
